info.author: uriel
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Snake Steak provides both a library and a command line tools to make interaction
with Freshmeat's restful JSON APIs more convenient for both python and shell
scripts.
info.keywords: freshmeat, packaging, command line, release scripts
info.name: Snake-Steak
info.summary: A python library and command line tool to access Freshmeat's new JSON API.
info.html_description: Snake Steak provides both a library and a command line tools to make interaction with Freshmeat’s restful JSON APIs more convenient for both python and shell scripts.
